name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comment Nomad - Move Youtube Comments Right

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read your comments while watching your YouTube videos!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read your comments while watching your YouTube videos! We are bringing back an experimental YouTube feature! Toggle your comment section to the right of the video and back!

If you have any issues, feel free to click on the extension to open the popup and contact us through the email provided. If you'd like to support the developers, there is also a button to buy us a coffee :)
